description: General schema for bank account statements.

fields.name: account_number
fields.description: Bank account number or masked identifier.

fields.name: bank_name
fields.description: Name of the bank or financial institution.

fields.name: statement_period_start
fields.description: Start date of the statement period.

fields.name: statement_period_end
fields.description: End date of the statement period.

fields.name: opening_balance
fields.description: Balance at the beginning of the statement period.

fields.name: closing_balance
fields.description: Balance at the end of the statement period.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Currency code for monetary amounts (e.g., USD, EUR).

fields.name: transactions
fields.description: List of transactions. Each may include date, description, amount, balance_after, transaction_type (debit/credit).
